Reviews.Title: good. needs upgrades
Reviews.Author: Austin Hatch
Reviews.Content: i got this phone second hand from someone and it has like no problems, its a little slow but all phones with use get slower.all the side buttons work great (which leads to one of my negative things)easy to interact with.has the front facing cameragood 3D very amazing fun to show friendsgood speaker qualityI like the music interfaceI like the abilty to make any games 3dnegativesthe 3D guide button is a physical button on the bottom right side if holding phone sideways or too tightly the button is easily and mistakenly pressed, this will drag you out of whatever you are doing, turn black for like 5 seconds, then waste your battery tremendously by turning the phone 3D when you dont want it tobattery life, battery life is terrible even without the additional headache of 3D. I have to turn my brightness down to about 1/4th to make it last a full day 8-8 o clock. if I use 3d at all that time is diminished quickly. at lowest brightness i got about 2 hours from full charge to no playing 3d games.all in alL I would own again, I just wouldnt pay 120 dollars for again
